results.title: Where I'm supposed to be...
results.creator_credit: Katherine O'Neill, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Katherine O’Neill celebrates her first passion, the place where she can be who she is, the place that inspires her and feeds her creativity.

results.title: Insert name here
results.creator_credit: Troy Maguire, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When his James’ parents bought him a drum kit, Troy Maguire and his friends decided to start a band. Now they just need a name, a few songs and a gig.

results.title: Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project
results.creator_credit: Ayen Guinto, Charles Skoutariotis, Chris Villarroel, Dean Sacco, Katherine O'Neill, Krystal Webb, Laura O'Donnell, Maria Savarino, Marten McEachran, Paul Young, Samantha Sharp, Troy Maguire, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Twelve stories from people from Melbourne’s western suburbs, created at ACMI as part of ‘Western stories : Expressions for the future’ Digital Storytelling project. The participants talk about the things they love and, in doing so, highlight what it is about them that make them unique.
results.title_for_label: Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ayen Guinto, Charles Skoutariotis, Chris Villarroel, Dean Sacco, Katherine O’Neill, Krystal Webb, Laura O’Donnell, Maria Savarino, Marten McEachran, Paul Young, Samantha Sharp, Troy Maguire, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Twelve stories from people from Melbourne’s western suburbs, created at ACMI as part of ‘Western stories : Expressions for the future’ Digital Storytelling project. The participants talk about the things they love and, in doing so, highlight what it is about them that make them unique.

results.title: The Most important question in the world
results.creator_credit: Paul Young, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Paul Young went to university, he knew he didn’t want to be a teacher. However, over time, he has seen the value of the profession and learnt that it’s not about the content, it’s about the life lessons.

results.title: For the love of...Lolo
results.creator_credit: Ayen Guinto, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved ‘Lolo’, her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ayen Guinto, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved ‘Lolo’, her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.

results.title: Bittersweet
results.creator_credit: Maria Savarino, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maria Savarino, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.

results.title: My tribute to my mum
results.creator_credit: Misty Briggs, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Misty Briggs pays tribute to her mother, a strong woman who had lived a hard life and overcame it all to give her family a better life.

results.title: Life story
results.creator_credit: Joel Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Joel Atkinson’s parents split up, his dad took him to Shepparton. Determined to make the most of it, Atkinson worked hard to be a good role model for his siblings.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joel Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Cousins
results.creator_credit: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
